# *=(_:_:)

**Operator**

Concatenates two affine transforms and stores the result in the left-hand-side variable.

## Declaration

```swift
static func *= (lhs: inout AffineTransform3D, rhs: AffineTransform3D)
```

## Parameters

- **lhs**: The left-hand-side value.
- **rhs**: The right-hand-side value.

## Applying arithmetic operations

- ***(_:_:)**: Returns the concatenation of two affine transforms.

items.description: Returns the concatenation of two affine transforms.
